Improvements.Improvement: Use private constants for recurring values
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- final int k=512;
+ private static final int K=512;
Improvements.Description: Instead of using the magic numbers directly in the code, define them as private constants. This will make the code easier to maintain and improve readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a helper method
Improvements.Change_Diff:
+ private UpdateSketch createUpdateSketch(int k) { ... } 
+ private void verifyResult(CompactSketch result, double estimate, boolean isEmpty, long thetaLong) { ... }
Improvements.Description: Repeated code for creating sketches and assertions can be extracted into helper methods. This simplifies the method and makes it easier to understand.
JUnit test methods should be annotated with @Test annotation for clarity and to avoid any potential issues with the test runner.
